pages.text: $(li)The Slime Armor is a bit better than the $(l:patchouli:armors/lapis_armor)Lapis Armor$(/l), $(l:patchouli:armors/feather_armor)Feather Armor$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:armors/magma_armor)Magma Armor$(/l).$(br)$(li)If you wear a complete set, you will get the Projectile Protection II effect, reducing all the projectile damage that you receive such as Arrows, thrown Tridents, Shulker bullets or Blaze fireballs.
